channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: IBM acquires data analysis startup Seek AI, opens AI accelerator in NYC
item.description: IBM on Monday said that it has acquired Seek AI, an AI platform that allows users to ask questions about enterprise data using natural language, for a...

item.title: 14 Best Bluetooth Speakers Our Testers Jammed With in 2025
item.description: These are our favorite portable speakers of all shapes and sizes, from clip-ons to a massive boom box.

item.title: Chime, last valued at $25B, aims for $11B in upcoming IPO
item.description: Chime, whose pending IPO is expected to be one of 2025’s blockbuster hits, issued a share price range on Monday of $24 to $26. That’s an up-to-$11.2-b...

item.title: Best Garmin Watch (2025): Tested and Reviewed for Running, Cycling, and More
item.description: We tested Garmin’s GPS-enabled fitness trackers and found the perfect picks for casual hikers, backcountry skiers, and more.

item.title: Breakneck data center growth challenges Microsoft’s sustainability goals
item.description: Microsoft's sustainability goals are imperiled by its push into AI and cloud services.

item.title: Elon Musk’s xAI reportedly looks to raise $300M in tender offer
item.description: Billionaire Elon Musk’s AI startup, xAI, is reportedly launching a $300 million share sale that values the company at $113 billion. The secondary stoc...

item.title: Cuisinart Propel+ 3-in-1 Review (2025): Pizza on a 4-Burner Grill
item.description: Making pizza on a grill turns out to be a great idea. But Cusinart’s Propel+ 3-in-1 also comes with some quirks.

item.title: A Neuralink Rival Just Tested a Brain Implant in a Person
item.description: Paradromics, a brain-computer-interface startup, inserted its brain implant in a person—briefly—in an early test of its technology.

item.title: Tesla files new ‘Robotaxi’ trademark applications after prior attempt stalls
item.description: Tesla has filed trademark applications for the term “Tesla Robotaxi,” after the company’s previous attempts to secure trademarks for its planned self-...

item.title: MSI Titan 18 HX AI Review: The Ultimate Gaming Laptop
item.description: MSI’s largest and most powerful gaming laptop is also its most premium, sporting a mini-LED screen and an invisible touchpad.
